text: (Jenumanja n'di) chisawu aŵala ŵaŵaliji paujo penu, (chitukomboleche kun'jonanga mwatwajonanjile ŵanganyao, kutendaga) ŵanganyao ŵaliji ŵakulimbangana nnope kumpunda ŵanganyammwe pamachili, niŵakwete ipanje yejinji nnope kwisa soni ŵanache, basi ni ŵasangalalile liunjili lyao (lya duniya ndema jannono), basi nombe jenumanja ni nkuŵa nkusangalalila liunjili lyenu (lya duniya kwandema jannono), yaŵatite pakusangalalila aŵala ŵaŵaliji paujo penu liunjili lyao, ni nkuŵa nkutiŵila (mmaloŵe gangali mate) yaŵatite pakutiŵila ŵanganyao, ŵele ŵanyao ni ŵagajonasiche masengo gao pa duniya pano ni ku Akhera kwakwe, soni ŵanyao niŵali ŵakwasika
